oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Marcellus Mundy correspondence with John T. Wilder, 1863 November 10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mundy, Marcellus, 1830-1901
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from Colonel Mundy to Colonel Wilder apologizing for publishing private information about Colonel Wilder's relationship with General Crittenden in his letter published in an 1863 October issue of the Louisville Journal newspaper. Mundy also requests that Wilder ask his men to write accounts of Crittenden's performance in the Battle of Chickamauga.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Chickamauga, Battle of, Ga., 1863; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865
Crittenden, Thomas Leonidas, 1819-1893; Wilder, John Thomas, 1830-1917
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: John T. Wilder military records and correspondence, 1862-1865
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: John T. Wilder Civil War correspondence and papers
